casebody.data:
Wright, Appellant, v. Ohio Adult Parole Authority et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Wright v. Ohio Adult Parole Auth. (1993), 66 Ohio St.3d 279.]

(No. 92-2519 Submitted April 20, 1993 Decided May 19, 1993.) John L. Wright, pro se.

The cause is affirmed for the reasons stated in the court of appeals’ opinion, in which appellees’ motion to dismiss appellant’s petition for a writ of mandamus to compel the Ohio Adult Parole Authority to grant him parole was granted.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
